str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To flood over, overwhelm, inundate. From kata and the base of kludon; to dash down, i.e. to deluge.
